about_the_game:
Classic Memory Meets Space Adventure

Space Memory TDG takes you on an exciting journey through the universe, where you'll not only test your memory but also challenge your strategic skills.

Discover and React

As you uncover thematically designed card pairs, keep an eye on the UFOs collecting nests in the background—each collection reduces your available playtime.

Time is Points

Speed is the key to success. Find all the pairs as quickly as possible and maximize your score with the remaining time.

Turret Mode: Action-Packed Challenges

For each successful pair, you unlock turret mode. Use this opportunity to shoot down UFOs, gain extra time, and boost your score.

Strategy and Skill Required

Combine classic memory gameplay with action-packed turret phases to climb to the top of the high score leaderboard.

The Final Test: Will Humanity Survive?

Will humanity prevail in this cosmic challenge? Your memory, courage, and strategy will decide the fate of the universe—step up, and make your mark among the stars!

Space Memory TDG takes you on an exciting journey through the universe, where you'll not only test your memory but also challenge your strategic skills.

For each successful pair, you unlock turret mode. Use this opportunity to shoot down UFOs, gain extra time, and boost your score.

Combine classic memory gameplay with action-packed turret phases to climb to the top of the high score leaderboard.

The Final Test: Will Humanity Survive?

Will humanity prevail in this cosmic challenge? Your memory, courage, and strategy will decide the fate of the universe—step up, and make your mark among the stars!

movies.name: Space Memory TDG - The World's Only Hope

name: Space Memory TDG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 oder AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 oder besser
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard-Soundkarte
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 oder AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 oder besser
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard-Soundkarte

short_description: Dive into 'Space Memory TDG,' an action-packed memory game set in space. Match pairs, master turret mode, disrupt UFO activities, and collect points through speed and strategy.
